summary: The true story of the price a young soldier paid for falling in love with a transsexual night-club performer.
cast: Troy Garity|Lee Pace|Andre Braugher|Shawn Hatosy|Philip Eddolls|Merwin Mondesir|Dan Petronijevic|Mike Realba|Jeanie Calleja|Barclay Hope|Tulsi Balram|Vince Corazza|Kathryn Zenna|Kent Staines|Sofonda|Jeffrey Murray Johnston|Kendall Knights|Nina Arsenault|Brian Bowman|J.C. Kenny|Paul Mota|Demitri Warner
keywords: tragic event|murder|drinking|beaten to death with a baseball bat|gay soldier
title: La novia de un soldado
